content.text:
# Edward Ka-yin Chow

Edward Ka-yin Chow (; born September 3, 1987, in Hong Kong) is a Hong Kong figure skater. He is the 2003, 2005, and 2006 Hong Kong national champion.
See also
*2007 World Figure Skating Championships
*Sport in Hong Kong
